text: Nazareth-ki Jisugi maramda amasung karamna Tengban Mapuna Ibungo mahakki mathakta Thawai Asengba amadi panggal heithabikhiba haibadu nakhoina khang-i. Mahakna mapham khudingda chattuna aphaba touduna amadi Satan-gi panggalgi makhada leiba makhoi pumnamakpu anaba phahanbikhi, maramdi Tengban Mapuna mahakka loinabirammi.
